title: 170: Sean Lowe’s Season Recap + Sarah Herron + Bach News
itunes:title: 170: Sean Lowe’s Season Recap + Sarah Herron + Bach News
description:
The Broads have a chat about some Bachelor tea, theories about Clare’s season, and then dive into Sean Lowe’s GOAT recap! They discuss his Colton similarities, their love of Catherine, Tierra, Desiree’s season that deserves more attention, and of course Pete/Kelley/Barb’s appearance in the episode. They are then joined by the wonderful Sarah Herron (Bachelor S17/ BIP 1&3) and chat about her time on Sean’s season, her life since, Mt Kilimanjaro, and pray she will come back for an upcoming Clare recap!
*Join The Broads Thursday (7/30) for their chat with Alex Dacy aka @wheelchair_rapunzel 
SARAH HERRON:
Follow Sarah: @sarahherron
Follow her nonprofit SheLift: @sheliftgrams
